General.Name: NIKKON HOLDINGS CO.LTD
General.Description: NIKKON Holdings Co.,Ltd. engages in the cargo transportation businesses in Japan and internationally. It operates through four segments: Transportation, Warehousing, Packaging, and Testing. The company transports cargo and products to users, such as four-wheeler and two-wheeler vehicles, automobile parts, housing equipment, and agricultural machinery. It is also involved in the provision of packaging processing services, including delivery agency and distribution processing of automobile parts, export packaging, and design of packaging specifications, as well as development of packaging materials, such as buckets and trolleys; and installation, assembly, precision adjustment, operation trial, dismantling, transportation, and domestic and overseas integrated work of machinery and production lines. In addition, the company offers test support services for four and two-wheeler vehicles, automobile parts, general-purpose products, etc.; waste collection and disposal, customs clearance/forwarding, vehicle repair, and insurance agency services; engages in the real estate sales and leasing, and brokerage management activities; office relocation and moving, system design/development, information systems, and consulting services; generates solar power; sells electricity; and warehouse and storage solutions. Further, it is involved in the temporary staffing, business contracting, machinery and equipment installation, and disassembling/installation; design and sale of distribution equipment and materials; parts/jigs design and analysis; contract manufacturing; industrial waste/secondhand goods petroleum sales; machinery and equipment installation conveyance; automotive maintenance and mandatory vehicle inspection; and third-party delivery activities. The company was formerly known as Nippon Konpo Unyu Soko Co., Ltd. and changed its name to NIKKON Holdings Co.,Ltd. in October 2015. NIKKON Holdings Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1950 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
